summary: Broken, desperate men chase their dreams and run from their demons in the North Dakota oil fields. A local Pastor risks everything to help them.
cast: Jay Reinke|Andrea Reinke|Alan Mezo|Shelly Schultz|Keegan Edwards|Michael Batten|Paul Engel|Keith Graves|Glen Granrud|Terry Forke|John Rupkalvis
title: The Overnighters
